item.title: China retaliates against U.S. port fees with new charges on American ships
item.description: The move comes a day after China ramped up restrictions on rare earths exports amid ongoing tensions with the U.S.

item.title: China's property slump this year is looking much worse than expected, S&P says
item.description: China's real estate market is on track to drop more than previously expected this year due to the lack of government support, S&P Global Ratings said.

item.title: 'Bitcoin is not an asset class': UK's biggest investment platform has a stark warning for investors
item.description: "We do not think cryptocurrency has characteristics that mean it should be included in portfolios for growth or income," Hargreaves Lansdowne said.
